original: 10 Indriyayamaka
analyzed: indriya yamaka

original: 10.3 Pariññāvāra
analyzed: pariññāvāra

original: 10.3.5. Paccuppannānāgatavāra
10.3.5.1. Anuloma
analyzed: anuloma

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so domanassindriyaṁ pajahissatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānāti saḥ domanassindriyam pajahissati iti no

original: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ pajahissati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana domanassa indriyam pajahissati saḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānāti iti no

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānāti saḥ anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam bhāvessati iti no

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam bhāvessati so cakkhu indriyam parijānāti iti no

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānāti saḥ aññindriyam bhāvessati iti no

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam bhāvessati so cakkhu indriyam parijānāti iti no

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam parijānāti saḥ aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati so cakkhu indriyam parijānāti iti

original: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissanti, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ parijānanti.
analyzed: satta puggalāḥ aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissanti no ca cakkhu indriyam parijānanti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissati cakkhundriyañca parijānāti. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissati cakkhu indriyañca parijānāti cakkhu indriya mūlaka

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ domanassa indriyam pajahati saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam bhāvessati iti no

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam bhāvessati saḥ domanassindriyam pajahati iti no

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ domanassindriyam pajahati saḥ aññindriyam bhāvessati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam bhāvessati saḥ domanassindriyam pajahati iti

original: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṁ bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ pajahanti anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññindriyañca bhāvessati, domanassindriyañca pajahati.
analyzed: cha puggalāḥ aññindriyam bhāvessanti no ca domanassindriyam pajahanti anāgāmi magga samaṅgī aññindriyam ca bhāvessati domanassindriyam ca pajahati

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ domanassa indriyam pajahati saḥ aññātau indriyam sacchikarissati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati saḥ domanassindriyam pajahati iti

original: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ pajahanti.
analyzed: satta puggalāḥ aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissanti no ca domanassindriyam pajahanti

original: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissati domanassindriyañca pajahati.
analyzed: anāgāmi magga samaṅgī aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissati domanassindriyañca pajahati

original: (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: domanassindriya mūlaka

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññindriyaṁ bhāvessatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam bhāveti saḥ aññindriyam bhāvessati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvetīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam bhāvessati saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam bhāveti iti

original: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṁ bhāvessanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāventi. Aṭṭhamako aññindriyañca bhāvessati anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāveti.
analyzed: cha puggalāḥ aññindriyam bhāvessanti no ca anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam bhāventi aṭṭhamakaḥ aññindriyam ca bhāvessati anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam ca bhāveti

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam bhāveti saḥ aññātau indriyam sacchikarissati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvetīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātau indriyam sacchikarissati saḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam bhāveti iti

original: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāventi.
analyzed: satta puggalāḥ aññātau indriyam sacchikarissanti no ca anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam bhāventi

original: Aṭṭhamako aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissati anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāveti.
analyzed: aṭṭhamakaḥ aññātau indriyañca sacchikarissati an aññāta ñassāmi iti indriyañca bhāveti

original: (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: an añña a taññaḥ sāmi iti indriya mūlaka

original: Yo aññindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ aññindriyam bhāveti saḥ aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati iti āmantā

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvetīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissati saḥ aññindriyam bhāveti iti

original: Pañca puggalā aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarissanti, no ca aññindriyaṁ bhāventi. Tayo maggasamaṅgino aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti aññindriyañca bhāventi. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: pañca puggalā aññātāvindriyam sacchikarissanti no ca aññindriyam bhāventi tayo magga samaṅgino aññātāvindriyam ca sacchikarissanti aññindriyam ca bhāventi aññindriya mūlaka

original: 10.3.5.2. Paccanīka
analyzed: paccanīka

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti saḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahissati iti

original: Pañca puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānanti, no ca domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissanti. Cattāro puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti.
analyzed: pañca puggalā cakkhu indriyam na parijānanti no ca domanassindriyam na pajahissanti cattāro puggalā cakkhu indriyam ca na parijānanti domanassindriyam ca na pajahissanti

original: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana domanassa indriyam na pajahissati so cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti iti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī domanassindriyaṁ nappajahissati, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti. Cattāro puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī domanassindriyam na pajahissati no ca cakkhundriyam na parijānāti cattāro puggalā domanassindriyam ca na pajahissanti cakkhundriyam ca na parijānanti

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessati iti

original: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ
analyzed: ye puthujjanāḥ maggam paṭilabhissanti te cakkhu indriyam na parijānanti no ca

original: na bhāvessanti. Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
analyzed: na bhāvessanti aṭṭha puggalā cakkhu indriyañca na parijānanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessati so cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti iti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na
analyzed: agga magga samaṅgī anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam na bhāvessati no ca cakkhu indriyam na

original: parijānāti. Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
analyzed: parijānāti aṭṭha puggalāḥ cakkhu indriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhu indriyañca na parijānanti

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti saḥ aññindriyam na bhāvessati iti

original: Satta puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānanti, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti. Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
analyzed: satta puggalā cakkhundriyam na parijānanti no ca aññindriyam na bhāvessanti dve puggalā cakkhundriyam ca na parijānanti aññindriyam ca na bhāvessanti

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam na bhāvessati so cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti iti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati, no ca cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti. Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī aññindriyam na bhāvessati no ca cakkhundriyam na parijānāti dve puggalā aññindriyam ca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyam ca na parijānanti

original: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti saḥ aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati iti

original: Satta puggalā cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānanti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissanti. Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
analyzed: satta puggalā cakkhu indriyam na parijānanti no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissanti dve puggalā cakkhu indriyam ca na parijānanti aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarissanti

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati saḥ cakkhu indriyam na parijānāti iti āmantā cakkhu indriya mūlaka

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahati saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessati iti

original: Ye puthujjanā maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyaṁ nappajahanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ
analyzed: ye puthujjanāḥ maggam paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyam na ppajahanti no ca

original: na bhāvessanti. Aṭṭha puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
analyzed: na bhāvessanti aṭṭha puggalā domanassindriyañca na ppajahanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti

original: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāvessati so domanassindriyam na ppajahati iti

original: Anāgāmimaggasamaṅgī anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvessati, no ca domanassindriyaṁ
analyzed: anāgāmi magga samaṅgī anaññātaññassāmīti indriyam na bhāvessati no ca domanassindriya

original: nappajahati. Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.
analyzed: na pajahati aṭṭha puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmi itindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca na ppajahanti

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahati saḥ aññindriyam na bhāvessati iti

original: Cha puggalā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahanti, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti. Tayo puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
analyzed: cha puggalā domanassindriyam na ppajahanti no ca aññindriyam na bhāvessanti tayo puggalā domanassindriyam ca na ppajahanti aññindriyam ca na bhāvessanti

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam na bhāvessati saḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahati iti āmantā

original: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahati saḥ aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati iti

original: Satta puggalā domanassindriyaṁ nappajahanti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissanti. Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
analyzed: satta puggalā domanassindriyam na ppajahanti no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissanti dve puggalā domanassindriyam ca na ppajahanti aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarissanti

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti? Āmantā. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati saḥ domanassindriyam na ppajahati iti āmantā domanassindriya mūlaka

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāveti saḥ aññindriyam na bhāvessati iti

original: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāventi, no ca aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessanti. Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
analyzed: cha puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam na bhāventi no ca aññindriyam na bhāvessanti tayo puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam ca na bhāventi aññindriyam ca na bhāvessanti

original: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññindriyam na bhāvessati saḥ anaññātaññassāmītindriyam na bhāveti iti āmantā

original: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam na bhāveti saḥ aññātau indriyam na sacchikarissati iti

original: Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāventi, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissanti.
analyzed: satta puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam na bhāventi no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissanti

original: Dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
analyzed: dve puggalāḥ anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam ca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarissanti

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti? Āmantā. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātau indriyam na sacchikarissati saḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam na bhāveti iti āmantā anaññātaññassāmi iti indriya mūlaka

original: Yo aññindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ aññindriyam na bhāveti saḥ aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati iti

original: Pañca puggalā aññindriyaṁ na bhāventi, no ca aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissanti. Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
analyzed: pañca puggalāḥ aññindriyam na bhāventi no ca aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissanti dve puggalāḥ aññindriyam ca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyam ca na sacchikarissanti

original: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti? Āmantā. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana aññātāvindriyam na sacchikarissati saḥ aññindriyam na bhāveti iti āmantā aññindriya mūlaka
